Title: Amends the 2024 capital projects budget to allow competitive grants to include funding for safety and security projects at small businesses at risk of hate crimes or attacks
Summary: Amends the 2024 capital projects budget to allow competitive grants to include funding for safety and security projects at small businesses at risk of hate crimes or attacks.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 54 of the laws of 2024, enacting the capital projects budget, in relation to safety and security projects at small businesses at risk of hate crimes
